start:
-----------------------------------------
Welcome to Kyle's, Deven's, Elijah's
and Reece's Escape Room project:

Within the interative escape room there
are 1,966,080 possible combinations of
rooms, names, scenes and items so you
will never have the same experience once!

You are going to have a different
experience as you selected difficulty {}
this mean That the AI, puzzles and timers
will be changed due to the difficulty
you have chosen
-----------------------------------------
dialog1.4:
Unknown character: 'Who are you?!' *Portrayed with interest.*
-----------------------------------------
dialog1.6:
Unknown character: 'well since you asked Im {} now why are you here!'
-----------------------------------------
dialog1.7:
{}: 'I dont know where here is.' *looking around*
-----------------------------------------
dialog1.16:
You and {} sprint away while trying not to look back!
-----------------------------------------
dialog1.17:
Your cornered, {} starts to boot the door down!
-----------------------------------------
Space StationOxygen: As you enter Oxygen control, The feeling of cold crisp air enters your lungs
Pure oxygen enters your lungs. You cant breath however you start to stabilise
Fresh air? in space. oh wait im in oxygen control.
Space StationReactor: That looks dangerous maybe i should stay away from the reactor
Pulsating power starts to emerge from the reactor
Space StationCafeteria:
The smell of roten food, How! Its all bagged up
*You look around and see a severd leg*
Well thats where the smell is comeing from.

Why is there a big red button in the midle of that table?
should I press it maybe not it might blow us up.
Space StationWeapons: This place looks rather....volatile. It has to be the weapons room. There seems to be a cannon inside the station, which might be useful, as the path to the next room is blocked by rubble, probably caused by that thing chasing you. Try and power the weapon, then clear a path to the next room.

It's a good thing you got in to the weapons room fast, A lockdown was just announced over the barely audible intercom. It may seem impossible, but you need to find out why this lockdown happened and resolve the issue as best as you can. Maybe check outside the station?
Space StationBridge: A small room with a good view of the rest of the outside of the station? You're definately in the Bridge, from which you can see the space stations Turbines. There are a total of 3 visible turbines, but only one of them are moving. The central monitor is displaying an unsettling picture of a humanoid statue covered in a Veil, perhaps the cause of this nonesense, but a concern for another time. There has to be some way to resart the turbines in order to bring the station back to full power.
Space StationNavigation: Judging by the map hologram you see in front of you, it's best to assume you're in Navigation. As you enter the room, you're met by a sight that seems almost other worldly, a statue of a humanoid, surrounded by a Veil. Perhaps they may have something to do with this, but that's a question for another time. You need to find a way to open the door to the next room, perhaps it'll only open when the stations navigation systems are turned off.
Space StationHangar: You see a large opening in the Hull of the station which leads to the vacume of space, meaning that you must be in the hanger, however not everything is as obviously explained. Containers, Cranes, even a few ships are levitating with no explaination as to why, No other explaination other than the Statue you saw in the previous room. You see the door to the next room, but it's at an higher elevation. You need to find a way to use whatever still functions to make a path to that door. Perhaps You can check the room to your left...
Space StationCommunication: You enter a room filled with green screens, all of which are displaying some sort of code sequence. There are radios on every desk, meaning you must be in the communications room. You can hear the sound of some strange signal eminating from the speakers, probably caused by the strange statue you saw in the previous room. You're in a hurry to leave this station, so you don't have time to look around, however you did notice a lever which might control the power. You see that one of the electrical outlets is eminating electricity, preventing you from touching it. Maybe you could make the signal clearer, then work from there.
Space StationEngineering:
You enter what appears to be engineering, with heavy machines taking up most of the room. You do, however notice a trap door, one that leads to some sort of panic room. You try to analyse your surroundings, but then you're caught off guard by the sudden sound of an alarm going off, and a voice appears over the intercom: 'Nuclear descent protocol deactivated:
 Imminent collision with Earth's surface: In progress.' Perhaps that panic room could come in use, if you could get it open before the station collides with the planet, and you're caught in the crash. You quickly see 4 Generators that seem to be powered, as well as some kind of core holders. You'd best find out how to power those things on.
Space StationClarity:
As you enter the mysteriously named Clarity Room, you hear a voice boom over the intercom: 'Artificial inteligence activated.
Enjoying yourselves, intruders? 
It's worth knowing the Cataclysmic Damage you will be responsible for today. 
Do not fool yourselves. This Facility is not simply the fruitless work of some pathetic scientist. 
This house was built by the Genius Clovis Bray I himself. Within lies humanity's salvation. La fontaine de jouvence. 
Made possible by Clarity control. 
Magnificant, wasn't it? An entity beyond our own dimension.
And the answer to Humanity's eternal struggle. Mortality.
Were it to fall into the wrong hands, humanity, and the universe, would be utterly doomed.
I have no reason to believe you are anything other than the wrong hands.
You now face Godlike Judgement. May it extend eternally.'
The Intercom shut off and an Alarm was booming across the station. You should probably find a way to stop whatever is happening.
CastleDungeons: A foul rotten flesh smell almost as if something has died in here, Well it is a dungeon after all.
